title: Fujifilm Drops Anti-Covid-19 Pill Avigan, Once Hailed as Silver Bullet
author: Miho Inada
description: Fujifilm Holdings Corp. said it was giving up on its antiviral drug Avigan to treat Covid-19, more than two years after Japan's prime minister hailed the pill.
cleaned_text: Oct. 14, 2022 8:39 am ET TOKYO—Fujifilm Holdings Corp. [it was giving up](https://www.fujifilm.com/jp/en/news/hq/8698) on its antiviral drug Avigan to treat Covid-19, more than two years after Japan's prime minister hailed the pill as a potential silver bullet in the pandemic.
